meanings: (사물의 아래쪽) the bottom, the foot, the lower part (=밑)

vlive.korean: '차 문 아래 향수예요?' "Is the perfume next to the car door?" 듣기 View video N.Flying : 우리 얘기 좀 합시다 #49
vlive.english: "Is the perfume next to the car door?"

vlive.korean: [사면초가][틈이 없는 위와 앙상한 아래] 근데 밑에 거 이제 뽑을 게 없네? [Stuck] [No space on top and weak foundation] There's nothing to take out at the bottom. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Stuck] [No space on top and weak foundation] There's nothing to take out at the bottom.

vlive.korean: [판으로 밀어 반죽을 아래쪽으로 모아줍니다] - 응 밀어 - 똑똑하죠? [Push the batter downward] - Yes, push it. - Smart, huh? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 정수빈의 유자머핀🍋🍞 (HOW TO COOK JungSuBin’s citron muffin)
vlive.english: [Push the batter downward] - Yes, push it. - Smart, huh?

vlive.korean: [무대 아래에서는 이렇게 웅둥이인데 무대만 올라가면 묘섹이 된다 이거죠] 실수 안 하길 제발! Please! I hope that I don't make a mistake! 듣기 View video AB6IX : [예삐소드] AB6IX (에이비식스) 서울가요대상 BEHIND
vlive.english: Please! I hope that I don't make a mistake!

vlive.korean: [네, 저희는 자리를 바꾸지 않았습니다] 마늘 원래 아래 라인에 있지 않았어요? [We didn't touch anything on the table] Crushed garlic was here, right? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
vlive.english: [We didn't touch anything on the table] Crushed garlic was here, right?
